articles.title: Swedish watchdog orders firms to stop using Google Analytics
articles.description: Four companies were ordered to stop using Google Analytics, as the Swedish authority joins claims the statistics tool breaches GDPR.
articles.content:
The companies were ordered to stop using the tool, as the Swedish authority joins counterparts in Italy, France and Austria in claiming the use of Google Analytics breaches GDPR.
A Swedish privacy authority has audited how four companies use Google A... [2515 chars]

articles.title: Google to use any public info online to train AI chatbot Bard
articles.description: Despite having to delay the launch of Bard in the EU over privacy concerns, the latest policy update gives Google more power than before.
articles.content:
Despite having to delay the launch of Bard in the EU over privacy concerns, the latest policy update gives Google more power than before.

articles.title: Amazon, Google, Apple, Meta, Microsoft say they meet EU gatekeeper status
articles.description: Alphabet's Google, Amazon , Apple , Meta Platforms and Microsoft have notified the European Commission that they qualify as gatekeepers under new EU tech rules, EU industry chief Thierry Breton said on Tuesday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, July 4 (Reuters) - Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google, Amazon (AMZN.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Meta Platforms (META.O) and Microsoft (MSFT.O) have notified the European Commission that they qualify as gatekeepers under new EU tech rules, EU industry chie... [1373 chars]
